H3.text: The River Yarra flows through which city. Melb

A4.text: Melbourne extends northward through the undulating bushland valleys of the Yarra Valley's tributariesâ€”Moonee Ponds Creek (toward Melbourne Airport), Merri Creek, Darebin Creek and Plenty River.

A5.text: Ferries and water taxis run from berths along the Yarra River as far upstream as South Yarra and across Port Phillip Bay.
